spin_wheel.description: Spin the wheel of the lighter to create a spark.

wipe_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the lighter to ensure better sparking.

rotate_wheel_for_spark.description: Rotate the wheel of the lighter to generate a spark.

cleanse_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the lighter to ensure efficient sparking.

spark_wheel.description: Step forward and then spark the lighter's wheel.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel of the lighter to produce spark.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to ensure proper sparking.

turn_wheel.description: Turn the wheel of the lighter to generate a spark.

cleanse_sparking_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the lighter for efficient spark generation.

generate_spark.description: Rotate the wheel of the lighter to generate a spark for lighting up.

maintain_wheel.description: Maintain the wheel of the lighter by cleaning it regularly.

press_button.description: Press the button of the lighter to release the gas.

wipe_button.description: Clean the button of the lighter to ensure smoother operation.

push_lighter_button.description: Depress the button to release flammable gas.

clean_button_properly.description: Clean the button for smooth operation.

press_lighter_button.description: Move your finger onto the lighter's button and press it.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure smooth pressing.

operate_button.description: Operate the button of the lighter to initiate the gas flow.

clean_lighter_button.description: Maintain the button of the lighter by cleaning it for efficient operation.

push_gas_button.description: Push the button to initialize gas output.

maintain_button.description: Maintain the button for efficient gas flow.

wipe_body.description: Clean the body of the lighter to maintain its appearance.

sanitize_lighter_frame.description: Sanitize the body of the lighter to keep it safe and clean.

clean_lighter_exterior.description: Clean the exterior of the lighter to remove dust and grime.

sanitize_lighter_body.description: Disinfect the body of the lighter to prevent the spreading of pathogens.

clean_lighter_body.description: Clean the body of the lighter to remove dirt and debris.

clean_body.description: Clean the body of the lighter for aesthetic purpose and proper grip.

maintain_lighter.description: Maintain the lighter by cleaning the exterior body.

sanitize_lighter.description: Sanitize the lighter body to keep it germ-free.

maintain_body.description: Routinely clean the lighter body to keep it hygienic.

ignite_lighter.description: Ignite the lighter by spinning the wheel and pressing the button.

clean_lighter.description: Clean the entire lighter including the wheel, button and body.

spin_and_press.description: Rotate the wheel and press the button of the lighter in a quick succession to ignite a flame.

ignite_lighter_quickly.description: Light the lighter by spinning the wheel, and immediately pressing the button.

clean_entire_lighter.description: Clean all parts of the lighter including the wheel, button and body.

sanitize_lighter.description: Clean the wheel, press the button, and wipe the lighter body to keep it clean and safe.

clean_whole_lighter.description: Clean the entire lighter, including the wheel, button and body.

use_lighter.description: Use the lighter by sparking the wheel and pressing the button.

ignite_flame.description: Ignite a flame by spinning the wheel and pressing the button together.

complete_lighter_maintenance.description: Clean the entire lighter including the wheel, button and body efficiently.

turn_press.description: Spin the wheel and press the button of the lighter in one fluid motion to ignite a flame.

rapid_ignition.description: Quickly light the lighter by spinning the wheel rapidly and pressing the button instantly.

total_cleaning.description: Clean all parts of the lighter, including the wheel, button, and body, for complete cleaning.
